name: hosts-awareness Chef cookbook
readme:
= DESCRIPTION:

This cookbook is used to manage entries in etc/hosts and ssh/known_hosts for nodes known by Chef.

= REQUIREMENTS:

Tested on Ubuntu and Mac OSX

= LICENSE & AUTHOR:

hosts-awareness/ssh_known_hosts/file_own.display_name: Owner of the resulting known_hosts file.

hosts-awareness/ssh_known_hosts/file_gro.display_name: Group of the resulting known_hosts file.

hosts-awareness/ssh_known_hosts/all_user.display_name: Should be applied to all users or only current user?
hosts-awareness/ssh_known_hosts/all_user.description: Setup for all users (/etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts) or just the current user (~/.ssh/known_hosts).
